displayName: Lunch Flow: connect your banks and financial data
description: Connect your bank accounts to view real-time balances, transactions, and spending insights. Search and compare activity across accounts, merchants, and categories to answer money questions quickly. Access coverage for 20,000+ banks in 40+ countries through your [Lunch Flow](https://lunchflow.app) account.

apiKey.description: Your Lunch Flow API key from https://lunchflow.app/destinations

capabilities.name: lunchflow_list_accounts
capabilities.description: Get a list of all connected accounts for the authenticated user. Returns account details including name, institution, provider, currency, and status.

capabilities.name: lunchflow_get_account_transactions
capabilities.description: Get transactions for a specific bank account. Returns transaction history including date, amount, description, merchant, and category information.

capabilities.name: lunchflow_get_account_balance
capabilities.description: Get the current balance for a specific bank account. Returns available and current balance information.
